special_features: Beneath the City of the Exxilons

releases.details: Released in omnibus format, with a subsequent episodic format release in February 1995.
special_features: Original release edits due to Australian censorship

notes: Was the third serial of Season 11.
The Daleks first encountered by Sarah Jane Smith.
Asserted as one of the last stories without any new Dalek designs.

continuity_notes: This story marks the first time that Sarah Jane encounters the Daleks.

plot.plot_summary: An energy drain traps the Third Doctor and Sarah Jane Smith on Exxilon. They form an uneasy alliance with a squadron of Daleks and a Marine Space Corps expedition to escape the deadly traps of the mysterious city at the heart of the planet.

The Doctor and his companions must navigate the hostile environment after a series of conflicts with the Exxilons and begin to understand the true nature of the energy drain affecting them and the Daleks.

In a tense standoff, the Doctor must find a way to infiltrate the Exxilon city's ancient technology to deactivate the energy drain while the Daleks pursue them, looking to regain their own lost power.

The Doctor's efforts culminate in a dramatic showdown in the city's control room, where alliances shift, and the Daleks' true intentions are revealed. A heroic sacrifice is made as the Doctor and friends manage to turn the tide against their foes.
